q: A Cambridgeshire academic has been asked by the Michael Government to re-write parts of the school history syllabus. Dr Sean Lang helped found the Better History Group and is BBC Radio Cambridgeshire's Dr History. I, and various others, think that students are being required to know a lot less now than they used to, said the Anglia Ruskin University lecturer. Instead, I teach the animals to perform on stage by allowing them to show off their individual personalities and talents, Popovich said.
